text: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Success is not the absence of obstacles, but the courage to push through them.
The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
Success is not a destination, but the road that you're on.
The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
Success is getting what you want; happiness is wanting what you get.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
Get busy living or get busy dying.
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
The unexamined life is not worth living.
Life is a journey, not a race.
Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
The happiest people don’t have the best of everything, they make the best of everything.
Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.
The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
Happiness is a choice, not a result. Nothing will make you happy until you choose to be happy.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Happiness is not a goal; it is a by-product.
The key to being happy is knowing you have the power to choose what to accept and what to let go.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Success is not the absence of obstacles, but the strength to push through them.
The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
Perseverance turns dreams into achievements.
Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
We are most alive when we’re in love.
Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
The greatest thing you’ll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
Love is the bridge between you and everything.
Where there is love, there is life.
Love is not about possession, it’s about appreciation.
Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.
The invariable mark of wisdom is to see the miraculous in the common.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you’d have preferred to talk.
The wise man does at once what the fool does finally.
Wisdom is not a gift; it’s a task.
The greatest wisdom is seeing through appearances.
Wisdom comes from experience, and experience comes from mistakes.
You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
Courage doesn’t always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, ‘I will try again tomorrow.’
The greatest test of courage is to bear defeat without losing heart.
Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
